item.title: REDtalks #008 - Hitesh on Imperative vs Declarative (and sandwiches)
item.description: Our very first REDtalks guest, Hitesh Patel, is back again to help us understand a fundamental architectural shift in how systems must change to support a Mode 2 methodology. In this episode we talk about levels of abstraction and how they effect automation processes.
